B

batchEnding(IMVConnection) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMV
The TNC Server calls this method to notify IMVs that all IMC messages received in a batch have been delivered and this is the IMV's last chance to send a message in the batch of IMV messages currently being collected.
beginHandshake(IMVConnection) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVTNCSFirst
The TNC Server calls this method to indicate that an Integrity Check Handshake is beginning and solicits messages from IMVs for the first batch.

G

getAttribute(long) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnection
An IMV calls this method to get the value of the attribute identified by attributeID for this IMVConnection.
getAttribute(long) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCS
An IMV calls this method to get the value of the attribute identified by attributeID for this TNCS.
getResultCode() - Method in exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException
Retrieves the TNC result code for this TNCException object.

I

IMV - Interface in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv
An Integrity Measurement Verifier (IMV).
IMVConnection - Interface in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv
The IMV and TNCS use this IMVConnection object to refer to the network connection when delivering messages and performing other operations relevant to the network connection.
IMVConnectionLong - Interface in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv
This interface can be implemented by an object that already supports the IMVConnection interface to indicate that this object is an IMVConnection that supports sendMessageLong.
IMVConnectionSOH - Interface in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv
This interface can be implemented by an object that already supports the IMVConnection interface to indicate that this object is an IMVConnection that supports sendMessageSOH.
IMVLong - Interface in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv
This interface can be implemented by an object that already supports the IMV interface to indicate that this object is an IMV that supports receiveMessageLong.
IMVSOH - Interface in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv
This interface can be implemented by an object that already supports the IMV interface to indicate that this object is an IMV that supports functions specific to IF-TNCCS-SOH.
IMVTNCSFirst - Interface in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv
This interface can be implemented by an object that already supports the IMV interface to indicate that this object is an IMV that supports beginHandshake.
initialize(TNCS) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMV
Initializes the IMV.

M

mResultCode - Variable in exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException
 

N

notifyConnectionChange(IMVConnection, long) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMV
Informs the IMV that the state of IMVConnection c has changed to newState.

O

org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv - package org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv
TCG IF-IMV binding specifications.

P

provideRecommendation(long, long) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnection
An IMV calls this method to deliver its IMV Action Recommendation and IMV Evaluation Result to the TNCS.

R

receiveMessage(IMVConnection, long, byte[]) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMV
The TNC Server calls this method to deliver a message to the IMV.
receiveMessageLong(IMVConnection, long, long, long, byte[], long, long) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVLong
The TNC Server calls this method to deliver a message to the IMV.
receiveMessageSOH(IMVConnection, long, byte[]) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVSOH
The TNC Server calls this method (if supported by the TNCS and implemented by an IMV) to deliver an SOHReportEntry message to the IMV.
reportMessageTypes(IMV, long[]) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCS
An IMV calls this method to inform a TNCS about the set of message types the IMV is able to receive.
reportMessageTypesLong(IMV, long[], long[]) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCSLong
A call to this method is used to inform a TNCS about the set of message types that the IMV wishes to receive.
requestHandshakeRetry(long) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnection
Asks a TNCS to retry an Integrity Check Handshake for this IMVConnection.
requestHandshakeRetry(IMV, long) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCS
IMVs can call this method to ask a TNCS to retry an Integrity Check Handshake for all current network connections.
reserveAdditionalIMVID(IMV) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCSLong
An IMV calls this method to reserve an additional IMV ID for itself.

S

sendMessage(long, byte[]) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnection
Gives a message to the TNCS for delivery.
sendMessageLong(long, long, long, byte[], long, long) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnectionLong
An IMV calls this method to give a message to the TNCS for delivery.
sendMessageSOH(byte[]) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnectionSOH
An IMV calls this method (if implemented by the TNCS) to give a SoHRReportEntry to the TNCS for delivery.
serialVersionUID - Static variable in exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException
 
setAttribute(long, Object) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnection
An IMV calls this method to set the value of the attribute identified by attributeID for this IMVConnection.
setAttribute(long, Object) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCS
An IMV calls this method to set the value of the attribute identified by attributeID for this TNCS.
solicitRecommendation(IMVConnection) - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMV
The TNC Server calls this method at the end of an Integrity Check Handshake (after all IMC-IMV messages have been delivered) to solicit recommendations from IMVs that have not yet provided a recommendation.

T

terminate() - Method in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMV
Closes down the IMV.

TNC_ATTRIBUTEID_PRIMARY_IMV_ID - Static variable in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCConstants

TNC_ATTRIBUTEID_REASON_LANGUAGE - Static variable in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCConstants

TNC_RESULT_ALREADY_INITIALIZED - Static variable in exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException
The IMC or IMV's initialize method was called twice without a call to the IMC or IMV's terminate method.

IMC or IMV cannot respond now.
TNC_RESULT_CANT_RETRY - Static variable in exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException
TNCC or TNCS cannot attempt handshake retry.

Exceeded maximum round trips supported by the underlying protocol.

Unspecified fatal error.
TNC_RESULT_ILLEGAL_OPERATION - Static variable in exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException
Illegal operation attempted.
TNC_RESULT_INVALID_PARAMETER - Static variable in exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException
Method parameter is not valid.
TNC_RESULT_NO_LONG_MESSAGE_TYPES - Static variable in exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException
Connection does not support long message types.
TNC_RESULT_NO_SOH_SUPPORT - Static variable in exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException
Connection does not support SOH.
TNC_RESULT_NOT_INITIALIZED - Static variable in exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException
The IMC or IMV's initialize method has not been called.
TNC_RESULT_OTHER - Static variable in exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException

TNC_RESULT_WONT_RETRY - Static variable in exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException
TNCC or TNCS refuses to attempt handshake retry.

TNC_RETRY_REASON_IMV_MINOR_POLICY_CHANGE - Static variable in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnection
IMV policy has changed.
TNC_RETRY_REASON_IMV_PERIODIC - Static variable in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnection
IMV wishes to conduct a periodic recheck.
TNC_RETRY_REASON_IMV_SERIOUS_EVENT - Static variable in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnection
IMV has detected a serious event and recommends handshake retry even if network connectivity must be interrupted.

TNC_VENDORID_TCG_NEW - Static variable in interface org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCConstants
Reserved for newer TCG-defined values.
TNCConstants - Interface in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv
A collection of well known or common constants to be used by the IMC and IMV packages.
TNCException - Exception in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv
An exception that provides information on IF-IMC/IF-IMV errors.
TNCException() - Constructor for exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException
Constructs a TNCException object; the resultCode field defaults to TNC_RESULT_OTHER.
TNCException(String, long) - Constructor for exception org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.TNCException
Constructs a fully-specified TNCException object.
TNCS - Interface in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv
These methods are implemented by the TNC Server and called by the IMV.
TNCSLong - Interface in org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv
This interface can be implemented by an object that already supports the TNCS interface to indicate that this object is a TNCS that supports reportMessageTypesLong.
